extensionName.description: Name of the extension. Personally I suggest to keep it in English for easier search on AMO.

extensionDescription.message: Allows to rotate and zoom images directly on any website from context menu.

enableTransformationAnimation.description: Checkbox in options to enable animations.

rotateImage.description: Parent context menu entry for image rotation.

rotateImageBy.description: Context menu entry for rotating the image by given number of degrees.

zoomImage.description: Parent context menu entry for image zooming.

zoomImageTo.description: Context menu entry for zooming the image to given scale.

resetImageTransformation.description: Context menu entry to reset either the image rotation or zoom.

resetAllImageTransformations.description: Context menu entry to reset all image transformations.
